company_description: Synthesia is an AI company that develops technology for creating and personalizing video content using artificial intelligence and computer vision algorithms.
founders: Lourdes Agapito, Matthias Niessner, Steffen Tjerrild, Victor Riparbelli
seed_investors: VAS Ventures, Tiny VC, SeedCamp, MMC Ventures, LDV Capital, Mark Cuban
embedding_text: Synthesia is an AI company that develops technology for creating and personalizing video content using artificial intelligence and computer vision algorithms.
